nodes.text: Robin Gurland was the casting director for Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace and Star Wars: Episode II Attack of the Clones. It was Gurland who discovered actress Keira Knightley's resemblance to one of the film's stars, Natalie Portman, who played Queen Amidala. Gurland also appears in the mockumentary R2-D2: Beneath the Dome.
